Package beanbags

Interface BeanBagStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
BadStore
public interface BeanBagStore
BeanBagStore interface. The no-argument constructor of a class implementing this interface should initialise the BeanBagStore as an empty store with no initial bean bags contained within it.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • addBeanBags

      void addBeanBags​(int num, java.lang.String manufacturer, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String id, short year, byte month) throws IllegalNumberOfBeanBagsAddedException, BeanBagMismatchException, IllegalIDException, InvalidMonthException
      Method adds bean bags to the store with the arguments as bean bag details.

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      num - number of bean bags added
      manufacturer - bean bag manufacturer
      name - bean bag name
      id - ID of bean bag
      year - year of manufacture
      month - month of manufacture
      Throws:
      IllegalNumberOfBeanBagsAddedException - if the number to be added is less than 1
      BeanBagMismatchException - if the id already exists (as a current in stock bean bag, or one that has been previously stocked in the store, but the other stored elements (manufacturer, name and free text) do not match the pre-existing version
      IllegalIDException - if the ID is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number
      InvalidMonthException - if the month is not in the range 1 to 12

    • addBeanBags

      void addBeanBags​(int num, java.lang.String manufacturer, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String id, short year, byte month, java.lang.String information) throws IllegalNumberOfBeanBagsAddedException, BeanBagMismatchException, IllegalIDException, InvalidMonthException
      Method adds bean bags to the store with the arguments as bean bag details.

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      num - number of bean bags added
      manufacturer - bean bag manufacturer
      name - bean bag name
      id - ID of bean bag
      year - year of manufacture
      month - month of manufacture
      information - free text detailing bean bag information
      Throws:
      IllegalNumberOfBeanBagsAddedException - if the number to be added is less than 1
      BeanBagMismatchException - if the id already exists (as a current in stock bean bag, or one that has been previously stocked in the store, but the other stored elements (manufacturer, name and free text) do not match the pre-existing version
      IllegalIDException - if the ID is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number
      InvalidMonthException - if the month is not in the range 1 to 12

    • setBeanBagPrice

      void setBeanBagPrice​(java.lang.String id, int priceInPence) throws InvalidPriceException, BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException, IllegalIDException
      Method to set the price of bean bags with matching ID in stock.

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      id - ID of bean bags
      priceInPence - bean bag price in pence
      Throws:
      InvalidPriceException - if the priceInPence < 1
      BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException - if the ID is legal, but does not match any bag in (or previously in) stock
      IllegalIDException - if the ID is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number

    • sellBeanBags

      void sellBeanBags​(int num, java.lang.String id) throws BeanBagNotInStockException, InsufficientStockException, IllegalNumberOfBeanBagsSoldException, PriceNotSetException, BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException, IllegalIDException
      Method sells bean bags with the corresponding ID from the store and removes the sold bean bags from the stock.

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      num - number of bean bags to be sold
      id - ID of bean bags to be sold
      Throws:
      BeanBagNotInStockException - if the bean bag has previously been in stock, but is now out of stock
      InsufficientStockException - if the bean bag is in stock, but not enough are available (i.e. in stock and not reserved) to meet sale demand
      IllegalNumberOfBeanBagsSoldException - if an attempt is being made to sell fewer than 1 bean bag
      PriceNotSetException - if the bag is in stock, and there is sufficient stock to meet demand, but the price has yet to be set
      BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException - if the ID is legal, but does not match any bag in (or previously in) stock
      IllegalIDException - if the ID is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number

    • reserveBeanBags

      int reserveBeanBags​(int num, java.lang.String id) throws BeanBagNotInStockException, InsufficientStockException, IllegalNumberOfBeanBagsReservedException, PriceNotSetException, BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException, IllegalIDException
      Method reserves bean bags with the corresponding ID in the store and returns the reservation number needed to later access the reservation

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      num - number of bean bags to be reserved
      id - ID of bean bags to be reserved
      Returns:
      unique reservation number, i.e. one not currently live in the system
      Throws:
      BeanBagNotInStockException - if the bean bag has previously been in stock, but is now out of stock
      InsufficientStockException - if the bean bag is in stock, but not enough are available to meet the reservation demand
      IllegalNumberOfBeanBagsReservedException - if the number of bean bags requested to reserve is fewer than 1
      PriceNotSetException - if the bag is in stock, and there is sufficient stock to meet demand, but the price has yet to be set
      BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException - if the ID is legal, but does not match any bag in (or previously in) stock
      IllegalIDException - if the ID is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number

    • unreserveBeanBags

      void unreserveBeanBags​(int reservationNumber) throws ReservationNumberNotRecognisedException
      Method removes an existing reservation from the system due to a reservation cancellation (rather than sale). The stock should therefore remain unchanged.

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      reservationNumber - reservation number
      Throws:
      ReservationNumberNotRecognisedException - if the reservation number does not match a current reservation in the system

    • sellBeanBags

      void sellBeanBags​(int reservationNumber) throws ReservationNumberNotRecognisedException
      Method sells beanbags with the corresponding reservation number from the store and removes these sold beanbags from the stock.

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      reservationNumber - unique reservation number used to find beanbag(s) to be sold
      Throws:
      ReservationNumberNotRecognisedException - if the reservation number does not match a current reservation in the system

    • beanBagsInStock

      int beanBagsInStock()
      Access method for the number of BeanBags stocked by this BeanBagStore (total of reserved and unreserved stock).
      Returns:
      number of bean bags in this store

    • reservedBeanBagsInStock

      int reservedBeanBagsInStock()
      Access method for the number of reserved bean bags stocked by this BeanBagStore.
      Returns:
      number of reserved bean bags in this store

    • beanBagsInStock

      int beanBagsInStock​(java.lang.String id) throws BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException, IllegalIDException
      Method returns number of bean bags with matching ID in stock (total researved and unreserved).

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      id - ID of bean bags
      Returns:
      number of bean bags matching ID in stock
      Throws:
      BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException - if the ID is legal, but does not match any bag in (or previously in) stock
      IllegalIDException - if the ID is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number

    • saveStoreContents

      void saveStoreContents​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Method saves this BeanBagStore's contents into a serialised file, with the filename given in the argument.
      Parameters:
      filename - location of the file to be saved
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is a problem experienced when trying to save the store contents to the file

    • loadStoreContents

      void loadStoreContents​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Method should load and replace this BeanBagStore's contents with the serialised contents stored in the file given in the argument.

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      filename - location of the file to be loaded
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is a problem experienced when trying to load the store contents from the file
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if required class files cannot be found when loading

    • getNumberOfDifferentBeanBagsInStock

      int getNumberOfDifferentBeanBagsInStock()
      Access method for the number of different bean bags currently stocked by this BeanBagStore.
      Returns:
      number of different specific bean bags currently in this store (i.e. how many different IDs represented by bean bags currently in stock, including reserved)

    • getNumberOfSoldBeanBags

      int getNumberOfSoldBeanBags()
      Method to return number of bean bags sold by this BeanBagStore.
      Returns:
      number of bean bags sold by the store

    • getNumberOfSoldBeanBags

      int getNumberOfSoldBeanBags​(java.lang.String id) throws BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException, IllegalIDException
      Method to return number of bean bags sold by this BeanBagStore with matching ID.

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      id - ID of bean bags
      Returns:
      number bean bags sold by the store with matching ID
      Throws:
      BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException - if the ID is legal, but does not match any bag in (or previously in) stock
      IllegalIDException - if the ID is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number

    • getTotalPriceOfSoldBeanBags

      int getTotalPriceOfSoldBeanBags()
      Method to return total price of bean bags sold by this BeanBagStore (in pence), i.e. income that has been generated by these sales).
      Returns:
      total cost of bean bags sold (in pence)

    • getTotalPriceOfSoldBeanBags

      int getTotalPriceOfSoldBeanBags​(java.lang.String id) throws BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException, IllegalIDException
      Method to return total price of bean bags sold by this BeanBagStore (in pence) with matching ID (i.e. income that has been generated by these sales).

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      id - ID of bean bags
      Returns:
      total cost of bean bags sold (in pence) with matching ID
      Throws:
      BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException - if the ID is legal, but does not match any bag in (or previously in) stock
      IllegalIDException - if the ID is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number

    • getTotalPriceOfReservedBeanBags

      int getTotalPriceOfReservedBeanBags()
      Method to return the total price of reserved bean bags in this BeanBagStore (i.e. income that would be generated if all the reserved stock is sold to those holding the reservations).
      Returns:
      total price of reserved bean bags

    • getBeanBagDetails

      java.lang.String getBeanBagDetails​(java.lang.String id) throws BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException, IllegalIDException
      Method to return the free text details of a bean bag in stock. If there are no String details for a bean bag, there will be an empty String instance returned.

      The state of this BeanBagStore must be be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.

      Parameters:
      id - ID of bean bag
      Returns:
      any free text details relating to the bean bag
      Throws:
      BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException - if the ID is legal, but does not match any bag in (or previously in) stock
      IllegalIDException - if the ID is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number

    • empty

      void empty()
      Method empties this BeanBagStore of its contents and resets all internal counters.

    • resetSaleAndCostTracking

      void resetSaleAndCostTracking()
      Method resets the tracking of number and costs of all bean bags sold. The stock levels of this BeanBagStore and reservations should be unaffected.

    • replace

      void replace​(java.lang.String oldId, java.lang.String replacementId) throws BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException, IllegalIDException
      Method replaces the ID of current stock matching the first argument with the ID held in the second argument. To be used if there was e.g. a data entry error on the ID initially entered. After the method has completed all stock which had the old ID should now have the replacement ID (including reservations), and all trace of the old ID should be purged from the system (e.g. tracking of previous sales that had the old ID should reflect the replacement ID).

      If the replacement ID already exists in the system, this method will return an IllegalIDException.

      Parameters:
      oldId - old ID of bean bags
      replacementId - replacement ID of bean bags
      Throws:
      BeanBagIDNotRecognisedException - if the oldId does not match any bag in (or previously in) stock
      IllegalIDException - if either argument is not a positive eight character hexadecimal number, or if the replacementID is already in use in the store as an ID
